title: Circling the Waggins: How 5 Misfit Dogs Saved Me from Bewilderness
description: A dog lover's true life adventure: Two middle aged women maneuver through one unexpected pet debacle after another in a rugged and isolated cabin in a National Park. They emerge from a dark and difficult time as they discover that even the tiniest of lives is precious; heartache and joy go hand-in-hand, and love is an eternal circle of wagging tails.
author: Cayr Ariel Wulff
